Greencastle Community
School Corporation
The Challenge is Ours; Commitment from Everyone; Excellence for Everyone

1002 Mill Pond Lane, Greencastle, IN 46135
Phone 765-653-9771 | Fax 765-653-1282

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 11.75pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

span.style: font-family: tahoma, sans-serif;;font-variant-ligatures: no-contextual; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(32, 33, 36);;font-size: 26px;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

div.p: With Governor Holcomb's most recent executive orders, he has closed all schools for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Yet there is still a requirement for us to complete 160 instructional days. While the physical buildings will be closed, eLearning will continue so that we can complete those required 160 days. We will continue to do eLearning on Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday each week. Thursday and Friday will continue to be waiver days. Teachers are still teaching and checking for understanding, so please continue to work together as a team of adults for your child's education. Each teacher and school will be sending you more specific instructions in the coming days.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

div.p: Students who are in classes to earn high school credits must be diligent to complete course requirements in order to earn credit for the class.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

div.p: As the calendar is set right now, our last day of eLearning for this school year will be Wednesday, May 13, 2020. Of course everything changes almost daily, so be flexible.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

div.p: If you experience any technology problems with your school device, please email: elearning@greencastle.k12.in.us and our tech team will be there for you!

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

div.p: Grab and Go packs will continue to be served on Wednesdays from 10:30 am - 1:00 pm at Door #3 of Greencastle High School.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

div.p: Some have asked about collecting personal items from the buildings. We are in the process of creating a safe and orderly way to get your items back to you. We will be doing that somewhere between next week and mid-May. Please be patient as we create that protocol. If you have any questions, please try your child's teacher first, then your school principal by using their emails that can be found on the school website under contacts. Social media does not always know the right answers but teachers and principals do.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

div.p: We are all in this together! We will come through this.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 11.75pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

span.style: font-family: tahoma, sans-serif;;font-variant-ligatures: no-contextual; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(32, 33, 36);
font-size: 26px;
font-family: Arial;
font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px;

br.span:
With the upgrade of the COVID-19 level in Putnam County, GCSC is making some adjustments to continue to protect our employees and families. As of 3:00 pm this afternoon all staff have been sent home to shelter in place. We will be checking buildings daily for routine maintenance issues, but no staff will remain in buildings longer than one hour.
We will be changing our delivery of "grab and go" meals from daily to weekly. Our current plan will stop serving packs on Friday March 27, 2020. We will begin serving bulk grab and go packs on Wednesdays only beginning Wednesday, April 1, 2020. You can pick up food from 10:30 am - 1:00 pm.
Please continue to go to door #3 at GHS and our Food Service Staff will ask for the number of children, under 18, that you are caring for and then they will roll a cart with food for that many children out to the curb. We will be asking you to load your own vehicle to minimize the time of contact. When you have finished loading, our team will return, collect, and sanitize the cart for a vehicle down the line.

span.style: font-size: 26px;
font-size: 26px; font-family: Arial;

div.p: Our summer maintenance crew did an excellent job at all the school buildings!
Thank you summer maintenance crew for your hard work and dedication! The buildings look great!
Our incredible GMS Cafeteria Staff showing off their fabulous school spirit!

span.style: font-size: 32px;
font-family: georgia, serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.style: font-family: georgia, serif; line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Welcome to the Greencastle Community School Corporation website. We hope that you find the information here helpful and informative. We are working hard to assure our community members we have essential information available about our schools in an easy-to-find format. We also want those of you who are seeking a new school home to have the information you need so that you can make the best educational choices for your children.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: We are proud of our schools, and we believe that the Greencastle Community School Corporation offers an outstanding education to every child it serves. This is our singular focus. Therefore, it is important that we receive input from all people, that make up our school community, concerning issues that are important for the continued excellence of our schools. If you have a comment on an issue about which you feel strongly, let me hear from you.
